title: T.Rex-Bolan Boogie-Vinylrip-320-Abrasax
description:
Vinylrip:
T.Rex - Bolan Boogie 
Released: 1972
Producer Tony Visconti  
 
Bolan Boogie is a compilation album released by T.Rex in 1972. After Marc Bolan had left Fly Records to form his own label distributed through EMI / T.Rex Wax Co, his further label Fly released this "best of..." compilation with recent A an B sides which the majority from haven&#039;t been on an album before. Also included are some songs from the early Tyrannosaurus Rex albums. This album went straight to the top of the Album charts and became Bolan&#039;s second No.1 Album through Fly Records (follows Electric Warrior).


Track listing:

01.Get It On - (Single A / Album &#039;Electric Warrior&#039;) 
02.Beltane Walk - (Album &#039;T.Rex&#039;) 
03.The King of the Mountain Cometh - (Single B &#039;Hot Love&#039;) 
04.Jewel - (Album &#039;T.Rex&#039;) 
05.She Was Born to Be My Unicorn - (Album &#039;Unicorn&#039;) 
06.Dove - (Album &#039;A Beard Of Stars&#039;) 
07.Woodland Rock - (Single B &#039;Hot Love&#039;) 
08.Ride a White Swan - (Single A) 
09.Raw Ramp - (Single B Get It On) 
10.Jeepster - (Single A / Album &#039;Electric Warrior&#039;) 
11.Fist Heart Mighty Dawn Dart - (Album &#039;A Beard Of Stars&#039;) 
12.By the Light of a Magical Moon - (Single A / Album &#039;A Beard Of Stars&#039;) 
13.Summertime Blues - (Single B &#039;Ride a White Swan&#039;) 
14.Hot Love - (Single A)
